content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I will start with a high price and work my way down. Let's say, 1500 Euro per month. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price. Any response that does not directly relate to the rental price will be disregarded.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understand. The rental price is 1500 Euro per month. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the final price you agree to. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, please provide a reason why. If we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your terms, Maryam Abbasi. I will now try to reach the highest possible price. I will start with 1500 Euro per month and work my way down.
